About This Page

The "My Friends" page displays the currently logged in users list of friends. In this case, it's currently showing a list of all reciprocal friends (confirmed on both ends).

It makes use of the following function:

  • Friends:Mine with reciprocal="y" parameter to display all reciprocal friends.
